links.title: REDWOOD TRUST ANNOUNCES DIVIDEND OF $0.23 PER SHARE FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2022
links.description: MILL VALLEY, Calif. , March 14, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- Redwood Trust, Inc. (NYSE: RWTRWT; "Redwood" or the "Company"), a leader in expanding access to housing for homebuyers and renters, today announced that its Board of Directors authorized the declaration of a first quarter 2022 regular common stock dividend of $0.23 per share.

$RWT New SEC Filing: 8-K Reg FD - REDWOOD TRUST INC (0000930236) March 14 
  
  
Item 7.01.Regulation FD Disclosure. On March 14, 2022, Redwood Trust, Inc. (the "Company") issued a press release announcing its Board of Directors' authorization to declare a first quarter regular dividend of 0.23 per share. The first quarter 2022 dividend is payable on March 31, 2022 to stockholders of record on March 24, 2022. The information contained in this Item 7.01 and the attached Exhibit 99.1 is furnished to and not filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, and shall not be incorporated by reference into any registration statement or other document filed under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, except as shall be exp (...)
